## Matrix.useArrayLike() method

Use any object that conforms to the array like intrface at the underlying array that this matrix scans to

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
useArrayLike(arrayLike: ArrayLike<any>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  arrayLike | ArrayLike&lt;any&gt; | an ArrayLike object |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
